thread.title_full: Vikings' D.J. Wonnum: Has surgery on quad - CBSSports.com

author: RotoWire Staff
title: Vikings' D.J. Wonnum: Has surgery on quad - CBSSports.com
text:
Watch Now: Wonnum had surgery on his quadriceps Thursday after being placed on injured reserve Wednesday.
The linebacker tore his quad during the Vikings ' Week 16 loss to the Lions and is out for the season. In 15 games in 2023, the fourth-year pro set or matched career highs in tackles (62), sacks (eight) and passes defensed (six). Wonnum will become a free agent in March.
